import React from 'react'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './index.css'; import * as ROUTES from '../../constants/routes'; class Footer extends React.Component{ render() { let technologies = ["react-js", "node-js", "flutter", "python", "embedded-c", "solidity"]; let services = ["fixed-price", "project", "module"]; let expertise = ["custom-software-development", "web-app-development", "mobile-app-development", "user-experience-and-design", "blockchain", "internet-of-things"]; let expertiseTwo = ["artificial-intelligence", "machine-learning", "electronics-design", "mechanical-design", "embedded-software", "CAD"]; return(
COMPANY

    { technologies.map((tech) =>
